data.name: SmartPlaylist_Status_EnterNameToSeeSongs
data.value: Enter a name to see matching songs

data.name: SmartPlaylist_Error_DuplicateName
data.value: A playlist with this name already exists!

data.name: CrashReport_Message
data.value: Nagi has encountered a critical error and must close. We are sorry for the inconvenience.

data.name: ElevationWarning_Message
data.value:
Nagi is currently running as Administrator. This may prevent some features (like adding music folders) from working correctly.
For the best experience, please restart Nagi without administrator privileges.

data.name: ArtistView_NoBiography
data.value: No biography available for this artist.

data.name: Folders_AddFolder_Failed
data.value: Failed to add folder. The path may be invalid.

data.name: Folders_AddFolder_Exists
data.value: This folder is already in the library.

data.name: Folders_Error_Playback
data.value: Error starting playback for this folder.

data.name: Onboarding_Welcome
data.value: Let's set up your music library to get started.

data.name: Onboarding_WaitingForSelection
data.value: Waiting for you to select a folder...

data.name: Onboarding_Error
data.value: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

data.name: Playlist_Status_SmartEmpty
data.value: No songs match this smart playlist's rules.

data.name: Playlist_Status_ErrorPlayback
data.value: Error starting playback for this playlist.

data.name: Playlist_Status_CreateFailed
data.value: Failed to create playlist. It may already exist.

data.name: Playlist_Status_CreateError
data.value: An error occurred while creating the playlist.

data.name: Playlist_Status_UpdateCoverError
data.value: An error occurred while updating the playlist cover.

data.name: Playlist_Status_RemoveCoverError
data.value: An error occurred while removing the playlist image.

data.name: Playlist_Status_RenameError
data.value: An error occurred while renaming the playlist.

data.name: Playlist_Status_DeleteError
data.value: An error occurred while deleting the playlist.

data.name: Settings_Reset_Message
data.value: Are you sure you want to reset all application data and settings? This action cannot be undone. The application will return to the initial setup.

data.name: Settings_ResetError_Message
data.value: An error occurred while resetting application data: {0}. Please try restarting the app manually.

data.name: Settings_LastFm_AuthError_Message
data.value: Could not connect to Last.fm. Please try again later.

data.name: Settings_LastFm_FinalizeError_Message
data.value: Could not get a session from Last.fm. Please try connecting again.

data.name: Settings_LastFm_Disconnect_Message
data.value: Are you sure you want to disconnect your Last.fm account? Your scrobbling history will be preserved on Last.fm, but Nagi will no longer be able to scrobble.

data.name: Settings_Import_Unmatched_Message
data.value: {0} songs could not be found in your library.

data.name: SmartPlaylist_RuleSummary_NoRules
data.value: No rules defined • All songs match

data.name: FFmpeg_Status_NotDetected
data.value: FFmpeg not detected. Please install FFmpeg and click 'Recheck'.

data.name: FFmpeg_Status_StillNotDetected
data.value: FFmpeg still not detected. Please install FFmpeg and click 'Recheck'.

data.name: FFmpeg_Status_Error
data.value: Error checking for FFmpeg. Please try again.

data.name: Update_Available_Message
data.value: A new version ({0}) is available. Would you like to download and install it now?

data.name: Update_UpToDate_Message
data.value: You are running the latest version of Nagi.

data.name: Update_Check_Error_Message
data.value: An error occurred while checking for updates: {0}

data.name: Update_Install_Error_Message
data.value: An error occurred while installing the update: {0}

data.name: Update_Downloading_Message
data.value: Version {0} is being downloaded. The application will restart automatically when it's ready.

data.name: Settings_Provider_NetEase_Desc
data.value: Chinese music service, great for Asian music

data.name: Settings_Provider_MusicBrainz_Desc
data.value: Fetches artist IDs (required for TheAudioDB and Fanart.tv)

data.name: Settings_Provider_TheAudioDB_Desc
data.value: High-quality artist images and biographies (requires MusicBrainz)

data.name: FolderPage_DeleteDialog_Format
data.value: Are you sure you want to remove the folder '{0}' from the library? This will not delete the files from your computer.

data.name: PlaylistPage_DeleteDialog_Content_Format
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete the playlist '{0}'? This action cannot be undone.

data.name: Settings_Dialog_Rescan_Content
data.value: This will re-scan all songs in your library to apply new metadata settings (like artist split characters). This may take a while depending on library size. Do you want to continue?

data.name: Settings_Dialog_RescanFailed_Content
data.value: An error occurred while scanning. Check logs for details.

data.name: Settings_Dialog_VolumeNorm_Content
data.value:
Volume Normalization (ReplayGain) ensures a consistent volume level across all your music.
This will analyze your music library and directly modify your audio files by writing ReplayGain tags. Only files without existing tags will be processed. This may take some time depending on your library size.
Do you want to continue?

data.name: App_CrashReport_LogFallbackError_Format
CrashReport_ReportIssuePreLink
data.value: Please consider reporting this by creating an issue on the

data.name: CrashReport_ResetAppAdvice
data.value: If this keeps happening, you can try 'Reset App & Data'. This will wipe your settings and library, which can help recover the app from a broken state.

data.name: SmartPlaylist_PlaylistNameTextBox_Placeholder
data.value: Enter a name for your smart playlist

data.name: SmartPlaylist_NoRulesMessage
data.value: All songs in your library will be included in this playlist.

data.name: AppDescription
data.value: Rediscover your local music collection with Nagi, a music player focused on speed, simplicity, and privacy. Nagi is built with C# and WinUI 3 to offer a clean, native Fluent experience. It's beautiful, efficient, and respects your privacy.

data.name: AlbumPage_Empty_Subtitle
data.value: Scan your music library to populate albums

data.name: AlbumViewPage_Empty_Title
data.value: No songs found in this album

data.name: ArtistPage_Empty_Subtitle
data.value: Scan your music library to populate artists

data.name: ArtistViewPage_Empty_Title
data.value: No songs found for this artist

data.name: FolderPage_Empty_Subtitle
data.value: Add music folders to get started

data.name: GenrePage_Empty_Subtitle
data.value: Scan your music library to populate genres

data.name: LibraryPage_EmptyState_Subtitle
data.value: Add folders to your library in Settings

data.name: LyricsPage_NoLyrics_Title
data.value: No lyrics found for this track

data.name: OnboardingPage_AddFolderButton_ToolTip
data.value: Add a music folder to get started

data.name: PlaylistPage_EmptyState_Subtitle
data.value: Create a playlist to get started

data.name: GenreViewPage_EmptyState_Title
data.value: No songs found for this genre

data.name: SettingsPage_WindowMaterial_Description
data.value: Select the backdrop material for the window.

data.name: SettingsPage_DynamicTheming_Description
data.value: Enable and configure dynamic theming options.

data.name: SettingsPage_RememberWindowSize_Description
data.value: Restore the main window to its previous size on next launch.

data.name: SettingsPage_RememberWindowPosition_Description
data.value: Restore the main window to its previous screen location on next launch.

data.name: SettingsPage_RememberNavState_Description
data.value: Keep the left navigation panel open or closed as you left it.

data.name: SettingsPage_CustomizeNav_Description
data.value: Drag to reorder pages in the navigation menu. Use the toggle to show or hide a page.

data.name: SettingsPage_VolumeNormalization_Description
data.value: Automatically adjust volume to the standard level (-14 LUFS) to avoid sudden loudness changes.

data.name: SettingsPage_CustomizePlayer_Instructions
data.value: Hover to toggle visibility. Drag to reorder. The divider separates center and right controls.

data.name: SettingsPage_CollapsablePlayer_Description
data.value: Animate the player bar to expand and collapse.

data.name: SettingsPage_RestorePlayback_Description
data.value: Save the current playback state to resume on next launch.

data.name: SettingsPage_AutoLaunch_Description
data.value: Start Nagi automatically when you log into your computer.

data.name: SettingsPage_StartMinimized_Description
data.value: When launched, the application window will be minimized by default.

data.name: SettingsPage_MinimizeToMiniPlayer_Description
data.value: When minimized, show a compact floating player instead of hiding the window.

data.name: SettingsPage_HideToTray_Description
data.value: When closed, hide to the system tray instead.

data.name: SettingsPage_TrayCoverArt_Description
data.value: Display the cover art in the compact player that appears when clicking the tray icon.

data.name: SettingsPage_ArtistSplitting_Description
data.value: Define characters used to split multiple artists (e.g. ';/'). Leave empty to disable.

data.name: SettingsPage_RescanLibrary_ToolTip
data.value: Rescan library to apply splitting changes

data.name: SettingsPage_OnlineMetadata_Description
data.value: Fetch additional information like artist images and biographies from online services (e.g., Spotify, Last.fm).

data.name: SettingsPage_MetadataSources_Description
data.value: Drag to reorder metadata sources. Hover over each source for details.

data.name: SettingsPage_OnlineLyrics_Description
data.value: Automatically fetch missing lyrics from online sources. (Privacy: sends track metadata to third-party services)

data.name: SettingsPage_LyricsSources_Description
data.value: Drag to reorder lyrics sources. Hover over each source for details.

data.name: SettingsPage_PlaylistsIO_Description
data.value: Export playlists to M3U files for use in other players, or import M3U playlists into Nagi.

data.name: SettingsPage_ExportPlaylists_ToolTip
data.value: Export all playlists to a folder

data.name: SettingsPage_ImportPlaylists_ToolTip
data.value: Import one or more M3U files

data.name: SettingsPage_ResetApp_Description
data.value: This will delete all library data, playlists, and reset all settings to their defaults. The application will restart.

data.name: SettingsPage_LastFm_Description
data.value: Connect your Last.fm account to scrobble tracks and show your currently playing song.

data.name: SettingsPage_LastFm_Scrobbling_Description
data.value: Automatically add the tracks you listen to on Nagi to your Last.fm profile.

data.name: SettingsPage_LastFm_NowPlaying_Description
data.value: Show your friends on Last.fm what you're currently listening to in real-time.

data.name: SettingsPage_Discord_Description
data.value: Show your current listening activity as your status on Discord.

data.name: SmartPlaylistSongViewPage_EmptyState_Title
data.value: No songs match the current rules

data.name: SettingsPage_AboutExpander_Description
data.value: Rediscover your local music collection with Nagi, a music player focused on speed, simplicity, and privacy.

data.name: SettingsPage_CheckForUpdates_Description
data.value: Automatically check for new versions when the application starts.

data.name: SettingsPage_Language_Description
data.value: Changes require a restart to take effect

data.name: SettingsPage_RestartRequired_Message
data.value: Please restart the application for the language change to fully take effect.
